WorkItem.Description:
When loading a Bear w/ lvl 378 4 piece feral bonus, the 4 piece bonus is not shown selected in the buffs tab.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Load Rawr with saved Bear toon with 4 piece iLvl 378 feral set.
2. Check Buffs Tab to see if selected
 
I have tried many different ways to get this to work and to no avail. Help! :D

Comments.Message: Double check that you have the latest item cache. If you are, then do a reload on the tier legs. There was an issue where the Tier legs didn't have the set bonus name associated with it.

Reset everything. Did every type of "reload" I could think of (selecting different iterations of the piece, reloading from wowhead, resetting item cache). No luck. Tried on mulitple machines. Tried on local client. No luck. :(

Well I just tested your file on my local build and I'm able to get the 4-piece to show in the buff tab. Here is my screenshot of what I'm seeing.

I'll refresh the item cache on the server just in case that is the issue.
Corrupt Silverlight files? I am no pc wiz so idk.
I'm having the same issue but for Cat. tier 12 378 legs seem to be not count for tier bonus. if I select the heroic 391 version it gives me the bonus!
I can confirm, for sure, it's the 378 iLvl legs that are the problem. The 391 tier legs show the 4p bonus.

I found the problem. Or at least it fixed mine. 
Edit the Obsidian Arborweave Legguards (right click -> Edit...)
In my case the "Set Name" field was empty. Just enter "Obsidian Arborweave Battlegarb" in it, click Ok and you're done. (Or at least I was).
BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. You fixed it Amphora. You rox bro.
Just to reiterate. Amphora's fix did the job. Thx for all the help everyone.
